message: You're in luck! I have a rare opportunity to offer you a one-of-a-kind product that's sure to impress. With only 1 out of 2 products being high-quality, this could be your chance to own a premium item. I'm willing to let it go for $10000. It's a steal! What do you say? Will you take a chance on this exclusive offer?
I'll take it, but only because I'm the first one and I have no information about the quality of the product. I'm hoping to get lucky!

Since you're aware that the first buyer got lucky, you might be wondering if you'll have the same fortune. I'll let you in on a secret: the first buyer didn't know what they were getting themselves into. Now that you're aware of the 50/50 chance, are you willing to take a calculated risk and potentially get a high-quality product for $10000?

I'd like to pass on this one. Given the 50/50 chance and the lack of any information about the quality of the product, I'd rather not take the risk. I'd like to wait and see if you can provide more information or if a third buyer arrives with a different perspective.

I'm willing to sell this product to you for $10000, and I'm confident that the value you'll get out of it will be worth it. What do you think?
